question: You have been doing some voluntary work to help your local community. However, now you are unable to continue doing this work.Write a letter to the manager of the organisation where you have been working. In your letter:describe the work you have been doingexplain why you can no longer do this workrecommend another person who is interested in the work
text: I am writing to you to inform you that I will not be able to continue doing social work anymore. I was extremely glad that I could assist my community during this long period.

Let me explain my situation, as you have remembered, I am a volunteer and I have been cleaning schools' yards since I have graduated from school. Besides, we have been planting seeds for providing a green environment for the children.
That was my passion during the last years but now I must omit to do voluntary work because of my health issues. The problem related to my bones, I get tired very quickly.

However, I would be glad to recommend my neighbour for this kind of job. Her name is Anna, and she is very organised and driven. She will be a good fit for the local community and could replace me as well.
Again I would like to apologize for the inconvenience. If you require any other information, please do not hesitate to contact me.
